name: The Kyoto Bagel Mystery Challenge
description:
Players: 1-20
Time: 10 minutes to a full day

A Delicious Mystery
Someone has been stealing all the bagels in Kyoto! Only you can figure out who is the culprit. However, it might require some, let us say, "hands on" investigation.

Who you are
You are a detective (and connoisseur) sleuthing through the
city of Kyoto to find out clues as to who has been scooping up
all the bagels.

The cover image, "Job Tantei Woman", is curtesy of Irasutoya .
